nodes.title: Article 6
nodes.summary: This partial document is the concluding section of a legal or administrative decree (Arrêté). It specifies the officials responsible for executing the order (the President of the Regulatory Authority College and the Director General of a specific Directorate), states that the decree takes effect upon its signature, and provides the place and date of signing (Kinshasa, 26 February 2009). It includes the signatures of the Ministers of Finance and of Posts, Telephones, and Telecommunications. The document also contains a disclaimer note indicating that the site hosting the text is under construction and that the texts are provided by associations without assuming responsibility for them.

nodes.title: Article 93
nodes.summary: This partial document consists of the introductory legal citations and preambulatory clauses for an official decree (Article 93). It lists the specific laws, ordinances, and ministerial orders that serve as the legal basis and authority for the upcoming decree. The main points covered are the references to foundational legislation on telecommunications, the regulatory authority, government structure, and previous decisions regarding a national numbering plan, culminating in a proposal from the regulatory body.
